title: Are you going to ever fix ASOL?
body:
Sustained damage is useless in a burst meta......

Comparison, I played sol, did like 300 damage with ASOL's ultimate, Bard hit 800 on me with his fuckign Q......

replies.body: I call bullshit. Your last Aurelion Sol game was September 20th in 2016. And Bard wasn't even in your game.
Plus Bard needs about 1000-1200 AP and a void staff to do 800 damage with his Q.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XWAM7Z5s,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-05-15T03:02:05.786+0000)
>
> Plus Bard needs about 1000-1200 AP and a void staff to do 800 damage with his Q.

he had sheen and did 800 i check the damage levels.

> [{quoted}](name=AngelExcaliber,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XWAM7Z5s,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-15T02:54:45.606+0000)
>
> I call bullshit. Your last Aurelion Sol game was September 20th in 2016. And Bard wasn't even in your game.

thats only ranked games your looking at fool....

> [{quoted}](name=Bultz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XWAM7Z5s,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-05-15T02:49:13.469+0000)
>
> How what?>

Oops forgot to type. How did a bard q deal 800 damage while s aurellion sol ult did 300? Was the sol really far behind and the bard was full ap? I do agree with some help for sol (something small though) but I'm confused about the example you gave.

> [{quoted}](name=BAPenguins,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XWAM7Z5s,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-15T02:55:35.473+0000)
>
> Oops forgot to type. How did a bard q deal 800 damage while s aurellion sol ult did 300? Was the sol really far behind and the bard was full ap? I do agree with some help for sol (something small though) but I'm confused about the example you gave.

He had sheen and used smite on me.

Then you should really change your post. He didn't do 800 damage with Q.
Apparently, he Q'd, smited and auto attacked you for this damage. Probably procced TLD as well.
Sol is fine. If you put in the time to get good at him, he's broken.
So is that a problem with ASol or damage creep?

> [{quoted}](name=zFrostistic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XWAM7Z5s,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-05-15T03:19:13.710+0000)
>
> So is that a problem with ASol or damage creep?

ASOL in my opinion. He is easily killed by anyone an inch away having 0 ways to counter it or defend himself. I mean you can't give a champion such a huge and obvious weakness. He needs to be ahead the whole game to be useful, but because he is so easily destroyed he never reaches late game on time to be effective. He does no damage. His Stars are super slow with no way of speeding them up.  Etc. Etc.
Try moving in the direction of his stars for a faster rotation, he has plenty of tools to justify his weaknesses.

That can easily be said for any low mobile squishy, ASol is lucky he has a stun to bail him out.

Also Malz was good a DoT champion in a burst meta until he was nerfed heavily.

the aurelion sol 1 tricks in d1+ are proof hes broken when mastered.


if u master him you will learn this just as well.

aurelion sol is such a piece of shit when mastered.
